entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
